    • Method Detail

      • fromRGBA

        public static Color fromRGBA(int r,
                             int g,
                             int b,
                             int a)
        This is a convenience function to convert from 0-255 format into float format.
        Parameters:
        r - Red component. From 0 to 255.
        g - Green component. From 0 to 255.
        b - Blue component. From 0 to 255.
        a - Alpha component. From 0 to 255.
        Returns:
        New color from r, g, b and a components divided by 255.

      • fromRGB

        public static Color fromRGB(int r,
                            int g,
                            int b)
        This is a convenience function to convert from 0-255 format into float format. Equivalent to calling Color.fromRGBA(r, g, b, 255)
        Parameters:
        r - Red component. From 0 to 255.
        g - Green component. From 0 to 255.
        b - Blue component. From 0 to 255.
        Returns:
        New color from r, g and b components divided by 255.
        See Also:
        fromRGBA(int, int, int, int)

        b - Color b.
        Returns:
        New color that is an addition of a to b.

      • multiply

        public static Color multiply(Color a,
                             float m)
        Parameters:

        m - Multiplication factor.

        public static Color interpolate(Color a,
                                Color b,
                                float u)
        Parameters:
        a - Color a.
        b - Color b.
        u - Factor of interpolation.
        Returns:
